title: Keep getting RADS error
body:
Every time I try to launch League I get a RADS error. I have tried the solutions listed [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here) but the problem persists.

Please help.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I don't know what was wrong, but the problem seems to have solved itself. 
Thank you for your help though.

Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if that helps.

If not, please reply back with the exact error you're receiving.

go to control panel then click on network and sharing center, click on change adapter settings, you should see your network adapter now be it wireless or an Ethernet connection right click it and select properties, then look for internet protocol version 4 select it then click the box underneath the selection window  that reads properties, then were it says  use the following DNS server addresses select that and enter 8.8.8.8 in the first box and 8.8.4.4 in the second one then click ok u should be able to connect again hope this helped
